About Us Welcome to Food Delivery – your go-to food delivery app for fast, convenient, and reliable service! Our mission is to connect you with the best restaurants, eateries, and street food vendors in town. Whether you’re craving a quick snack, a hearty dinner, or a refreshing drink, Food Delivery is here to deliver. Review Application Favorite No favorite items yet!
Help and FAQ Frequently Asked Questions How do I place an order? You can browse restaurants and dishes, then add your favorite items to the cart and proceed to checkout. Can I cancel or change my order? Orders can only be changed or canceled before the restaurant confirms the order. How can I track my delivery? After placing your order, go to "My Orders" to view real-time tracking updates. What payment methods do you accept? We accept credit/debit cards, e-wallets like MoMo and ZaloPay, and cash on delivery.
